Posts.Content: Im 3 months post op, after a full abdominal hysterectomy following my diagnosis of womb cancer. I have been doing brilliantly, then yesterday we received the news that mum has been diagnosed with breast cancer.... This feels worse than when I was diagnosed, feel sick to the stomach. We go back to hospital Friday to speak with cancer nurse and obtain op date.... I've been so strong during my journey and mum supported me all through it, I just hope i Have the strength to keep positive fo mum.
Posts.Title: Mum just diagnosed with breast cancer, I'm recovering from womb c...
